String.string:
Speak with {@linkcreature:3053#1000#Velik} in Velik's Dream.
[Speak with {@linkcreature:63#11000#Velie} to get inside Velik's Dream.]

Unlocks the new Phantom Arrow skill in the Skills tab, which can be used in Thulsa's Shade.
(If Thulsa's Shade does not appear even on reentry, enter the /Reset command in the chat window.)

Unlocks the new Phantom Explosion skill in the Skills tab, which can be used in Thulsa's Shade.
(If Thulsa's Shade does not appear even on reentry, enter the /Reset command in the chat window.)

Defeat Thulsa's Shade.
[If Thulsa's Shade does not appear even on reentry, enter the /Reset command in the chat window.]
You end the conversation with the goddess.
Speak with Velik, who looks at you with pride.
